One of the few multiplayer games I can stand to play solo, killer or survivor. Though it is fun alone, survivor is infinitely more fun when you play with people and I'd definitely recommend it. Lots of fun messing around with different combinations of perks and switching up characters, and there's lots of incentive to grind and level to unlock teachable perks and whatnot. Also, the game is still updated and gets new dlc occasionally, including new survivors, killers, perks, and maps to keep things interesting. Overall great game.

I think [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/dragonsflamestufftbh/recommended/381210/]harv's review[/url] nails the strengths and weaknesses of this game better than I could. I don't want to spend much time rehashing what's already been said, so I'd encourage you to read his review for more in-depth discussion, but here are a few brief thoughts of my own:

The premise of this game is great: 1 killer hunts 4 other players and attempts to sacrifice them on meat hooks, while the rest play as survivors who are trying to repair enough generators to open the gates and escape. And when everyone plays the game the way it's marketed as being played, it's brilliant.

Unfortunately, the points system used to level up doesn't actually support the intended play style. Because it's essentially based on participation, rather than win conditions, there's more incentive for players to drag out the game than to try to win it. You end up with survivors who should be in a hurry to escape alive instead running in circles near the door after it's been opened, or even actively trolling the killer to earn chase points, because even if they end up losing (dying) as a result, they come out ahead on points. Meanwhile, you get killers who should be trying to actually sacrifice survivors instead dumping them by the exit to be nice because letting them escape costs them little, or standing around while downed players heal just so they can then beat on them more to earn extra brutality points.

This is a tough game to rate, because my experiences have been almost fifty-fifty. Every time I play, it's basically a coin flip whether it will be an enjoyable experience or not, depending what kind of players I get stuck with. When it's good, it's really good. When it's bad, it's really bad.

I don't regret my purchase, and I continue to play it and enjoy it – well, at least half the time, anyway. But at that level of inconsistency, I can't whole-heartedly recommend it either. Especially not at full price.

I've had this game since its Alpha, it was bland but creative and I knew it would shape into a great game eventually from the state it was in. The game today is amazing, its fluid, smooth, it runs super great, its fun to play as a survivor role and the killer role. This isn't a game where you just start it up ez pz and get wins instantly, you probably won't win right away and might get mad, because this is one very difficult game to learn. So many perks to memorize, so many abilites, offerings, addons, items, strats, map layouts that are rng, etc. 

The perk system really lets you customize how you play the game weather you want to be a stealth survivor, quick running, quick generator repairing, team medic support, whatever it is you will have fun shaping your survivor and killer styles. I will say though, the $20 price is well worth it, but theres a lot to get from the DLC's if you think the killer would be fun or the perks from that DLC look good and you want them you gotta buy the DLC.

I highly recommend this game when its on sale, or at least the DLC, $20 is perfect for the base game, go ahead and get it and possibly a few DLC if you want, but wait to buy all the DLC for a sale. I myself have spent About $90 or so just to get all the DLC killers/survivors/perks and even bought some cosmetic packs. Get the game for $20 and a DLC or two, but wait to grab it all when there is a sale and you'll save a lot of money. If money isn't a problem, grab it all and you'll have hundreds of hours of content. I have 400+ hours and still don't have it all.

Dead by Daylight - игра в жанре ужасов 4 на 1, где один берет на себя роль убийцы, цель которого - поймать всех выживших и принести в жертву загадочной сущности, а другие 4 игрока - роль жертв, цель которых постаратся завести все генераторы и сбежать
Плюсы: 
+Графика
+Жуткая атмосфера 
+Большое кол-во навыков, предметов, улучшений для них и подношений что даёт кучу возможностей
+Разработчики не бросают игру, а добавляют много нового и исправляют баги
+Присутствуют скины, которые можно купить за игровую валюту и одеть на любимых персонажей
Минусы: 
-Токсичное комьюнити ( не всё, но большая его часть )
Итог: хорошая игра, рекомендую покупать!

DBDzinho da massa ou mais conhecido como DEAD BY DAYLIGHT é um game de survival horror multiplayer em 3ª pessoa onde um assasino é convocado por uma entidade para matar 4 sobreviventes também invocados pela mesma. O game está em constante atualização, recebendo frequentemente novas dlcs com novos killers e survivors alem de novos mapas tematicos. Com as varias atualizações que o game recebe também não podem faltar eventos, com skins novas, novas mecanicas de jogo, etc, etc, etc.
O game tem 3 problemas que na minha opnião, fazem com que as vezes você queira desistir do game, são elas a toxidade e os conflitos constantes entre os jogadores, sejam eles killers ou survivors, a má otimização e bugs do jogo, um exemplo são as hitboxes cagadas e o bug de loading infinito com os survivors, e o desbalanceamento em alguns personagens COF COF LEGION COF COF
O game é pioneiro em seu genero e consegue trazer uma experiencia divertida, mesmo com os varios problemas citados, na minha opnião ele merece uma nota 7, por causa dos problemas tecnicos ja citados :3

[h1]JOGO:[/h1]
▸O jogo em si é bem legal mesmo sem amigos, pois você tem a opção de jogar como killer e fazer os sobreviventes passar raiva com seu memento mori. Se você tiver amigos, tu podes jogar com eles como sobreviventes e acaba sendo muito divertido (tenso também). 

[code] Porém há uma ocorrência bem frequente que pode ate mesmo desanimar o jogador para jogar esse jogo.[/code]

[h1] BUG MUITO CHATO [/h1]

▸Infelizmente ocorre um bug muito frequente antes da partida começar. Na tela de carregamento é onde o bug acontece, pois do nada o jogo crasha do nada, mesmo sem nenhuma queda de desempenho.

초반 (20시간)
생존자: 더럽게 무서워네(심장 터지는 줄)
살인마: 나 좀 재능 있는 걸? (실력이 부족한 생존자 잡아 좋아했음)

중반 (60시간)
생존자: 그래도 무섭다(다른 생존자 맞을동안 절대 숨어있음)
살인마: 헤헤헿 잡았다 (살인마 잡는 것에 재미가 생김)

중후반 (90시간)
생존자: 나 잡아봐라 (살인마 가지고 노는 맛이 생김)
살인마: 제발 이로와 (겁나 잘하는 생존자 만나 발려서 빡침)

후반 (120시간)
생존자: 잘하는 놈들 말고 다 덤벼(도망치는것에 대한 자신감이 생김)
살인마: 잘하는 놈들 말고 다 걸려봐!(추격에 대한 자신감이 생김)

PROS - If you are a horror movie/game fan, this is an obvious choice to play. Tons of variety in cosmetics and rewards with a ranking system. There are a lot of choice of survivors or killers. The maps are nice and a wide variety. Survive with friends is fun. There's no communication in random lobbies making it much more challenging.

CONS - The game can seem rather toxic, it is competitive after all. I would suggest survive with friends to avoid this. There are a lot of bugs, connection drops, stuck lobbies, crashes on loading screens, offerings* lost on killer disconnect or not loading in, hit boxes for killers are a bit too extra, cough cough huntress hatches... The ranking system is very unrewarding, its basically just a number to prove how good you are. Passing all this, the game has been improving over time!

*Offerings are a 1 time use item in every match you play. These can consist of receiving extra blood points, a type of shroud, coins to spawn more chests amongst others.

However past all the cons, this game is definitely worthy of a try. 

I have allowed comments on my review so feel free to drop any questions!
It's alright I guess
